verbs.description: kansas gun law no defense to federal firearm charges [ARG0: an appeals court] [ARGM-TMP: on tuesday] [V: upheld] [ARG1: the firearms convictions against two kansas men who mistakenly believed that a kansas law can shield from federal prosecution anyone owning firearms made sold and kept in the state the 10th u s circuit court of appeals rejected shane cox and jeremy kettler challenges to their federal convictions under the national firearms act the three - judge panel did not address the constitutionality of the state second amendment protection act which kansas defended when intervening in the criminal case the state gun law says firearms accessories and ammunition manufactured and kept within kansas borders are exempt from federal gun control congress kansas legislature kansas wichita gun sam brownback kettler facebook shane cox jeremy kettler law u s circuit court of appeals firearm united states courts of appeals]
